org.sopra.api

Interface Statistics


  • public interface Statistics
    The statistics contain information on the state of a scenario.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getAdjustmentScore()
      Returns the costs that were paid so far to regulate controllable energy nodes.
      double getBuildPlantCost()
      Returns the accumulated build plant cost.
      double getConsumerLoad()
      Returns the total load ratio of all consumers in the scenario.
      double getConsumptionPenaltyCost()
      Returns the total costs caused at consumers for falling short of minimum load and not providing enough energy.
      double getConsumptionScore()
      Returns the total consumption score that has been achieved so far.
      double getConsumptionScoreLastRound()
      Returns the consumption score of the last round.
      int getEnergyConsumedLastRound()
      Returns the amount of energy which was consumed last round.
      int getEnergyProducedLastRound()
      Returns the amount of energy which was produced last round.
      double getOverallScore()
      Returns the score of the team in this game.
      double getProducerLoad()
      Returns the total load ratio of all producers in the scenario.
      double getProductionPenaltyCost()
      Returns the total costs caused at producers for falling short of minimum load and not taking enough energy.
      double getProductionScore()
      Returns the total production score that has been achieved so far.
      double getProductionScoreLastRound()
      Returns the production score of the last round.
      double getRenewableEnergyRatio()
      Returns the ratio of the amount of renewable energy to the total amount of produced energy.
      double getSunIntensity()
      Returns the current percentage of sun intensity.
      double[] getSunIntensityPerDay()
      Returns an array of percentage values of sun intensity.
      double getUpgradeLineCost()
      Returns the accumulated upgrade line cost.
      double getWindStrength()
      Returns the current percentage of wind strength.

    • Method Detail

      • getRenewableEnergyRatio

        double getRenewableEnergyRatio()
        Returns the ratio of the amount of renewable energy to the total amount of produced energy.
        Returns:
        The renewable energy ratio.

      • getOverallScore

        double getOverallScore()
        Returns the score of the team in this game.

        Warning: score can be negative.

        Returns:
        The score.

      • getBuildPlantCost

        double getBuildPlantCost()
        Returns the accumulated build plant cost.

        Expected to be less or equal to 0.

        Returns:
        The build plant cost.

      • getUpgradeLineCost

        double getUpgradeLineCost()
        Returns the accumulated upgrade line cost.

        Expected to be less or equal to 0.

        Returns:
        The upgrade line cost.

      • getAdjustmentScore

        double getAdjustmentScore()
        Returns the costs that were paid so far to regulate controllable energy nodes.

        Expected to be less or equal to 0.

        Returns:
        The adjustment cost.

      • getConsumptionScoreLastRound

        double getConsumptionScoreLastRound()
        Returns the consumption score of the last round. Corresponds to profit by consumption in last round.

        Expected to be greater or equal to 0.

        Returns:
        The consumption score of the last round.

      • getConsumptionScore

        double getConsumptionScore()
        Returns the total consumption score that has been achieved so far. Corresponds to total profit by consumption.

        Expected to be greater or equal to 0.

        Returns:
        The total consumption score.

      • getProductionScoreLastRound

        double getProductionScoreLastRound()
        Returns the production score of the last round. Corresponds to cost of production in last round.

        Expected to be less or equal to 0.

        Returns:
        The production score of the last round.

      • getProductionScore

        double getProductionScore()
        Returns the total production score that has been achieved so far. Corresponds to total cost of production.

        Expected to be less or equal to 0.

        Returns:
        The total consumption score.

      • getConsumerLoad

        double getConsumerLoad()
        Returns the total load ratio of all consumers in the scenario.

        Expected to be greater or equal to 0.

        Returns:
        The consumer's total load.

      • getProducerLoad

        double getProducerLoad()
        Returns the total load ratio of all producers in the scenario.

        Expected to be greater or equal to 0.

        Returns:
        The producer's total load.

      • getConsumptionPenaltyCost

        double getConsumptionPenaltyCost()
        Returns the total costs caused at consumers for falling short of minimum load and not providing enough energy.

        Expected to be less or equal to 0.

        Returns:
        The costs of not providing enough energy.

      • getProductionPenaltyCost

        double getProductionPenaltyCost()
        Returns the total costs caused at producers for falling short of minimum load and not taking enough energy.

        Expected to be less or equal to 0.

        Returns:
        The costs of not taking enough energy.

      • getWindStrength

        double getWindStrength()

        Returns the current percentage of wind strength.

        A wind strength of 0 indicates that there is no wind. A wind strength of 1 indicates maximum wind strength.
        Returns:
        The wind strength as a value between 0 and 1.

      • getSunIntensity

        double getSunIntensity()

        Returns the current percentage of sun intensity.

        A sun intensity of 0 indicates that there is no sun. A sun intensity of 1 indicates maximum sun intensity.
        Returns:
        The sun intensity as a value between 0 and 1.

      • getSunIntensityPerDay

        double[] getSunIntensityPerDay()

        Returns an array of percentage values of sun intensity.

        Each entry in the array represents the sun intensity at a specific hour of the day. The index of the an array element indicates the hour of the day. The array contains 24 elements starting from 0 and ending at 23.
        Returns:
        The array of percentage values of sun intensity of a day.

      • getEnergyConsumedLastRound

        int getEnergyConsumedLastRound()
        Returns the amount of energy which was consumed last round.
        Returns:
        The amount of consumed energy in last round.

      • getEnergyProducedLastRound

        int getEnergyProducedLastRound()
        Returns the amount of energy which was produced last round.
        Returns:
        The amount of produced energy in last round.
